definition: to rest/to stop doing sth for a period of time/to cease/(imperative) don't
breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]

sentences.english: This class will be over in a moment, now let's take a nap(break , catnap).
sentences.chinese: 本課時將近結束，大家可以休息一會兒。

sentences.english: This class will be over in a moment, now let's take a nap(break , catnap).
sentences.chinese: 本課時快要竣事，各人可以休息一會兒。

sentences.english: They spend long hours staring at the screen with few breaks.
sentences.chinese: 他們長時間地注視屏幕，幾乎不休息。

sentences.english: He was laid up for a week by an intestinal bug.
sentences.chinese: 他因爲腸道感染細菌休息了一週。

sentences.english: Meg and gilbert are relaxing in first class .
sentences.chinese: 梅格和吉伯特在頭等艙裏休息。

sentences.english: I'll take a rest at this teahouse.
sentences.chinese: 那我就先在這家茶樓休息一會兒。

sentences.english: The young author burned energy as if he never heard of resting.
sentences.chinese: 這位青年作家耗費精力，似乎從未聽說過休息。

sentences.english: All patients were enforced recumbency and treated with large amount of fluid.
sentences.chinese: 治療措施包括臥牀休息，大量補充液體。

sentences.english: The company to RenHui forever, I resolution people a break.
sentences.chinese: 仁惠把公司交給永民，本人決議休息一段時間。

sentences.english: I went to the sofa to rest and imagine tomorrow's sunset.
sentences.chinese: 我坐到沙發上去休息，想象着明天的日落會是怎樣。

sentences.english: Evening return to Kota Kinabalu hotel.
sentences.chinese: 傍晚回返亞庇市酒店休息。

sentences.english: On the half way to the mountain, the tourists had a rest and snacked on some bread.
sentences.chinese: 在登山的途中，遊客們休息了會兒，吃了點兒麪包。

sentences.english: So I took a break and worked in the garden arranging new plantings.
sentences.chinese: 於是，我讓自己休息，去花園排布新種植的植物。

sentences.english: "We think he'll be out for a couple of weeks yet, " said the manager.
sentences.chinese: “我們覺得他還得休息幾周，”經理說。

sentences.english: It has been real resting, for I could consistently sleep until naturally wake up.
sentences.chinese: 真的是休息了，每天都睡到自然醒。

definition: to have a rest/to stay for the night/to go to bed/to sleep
to rest/to take a break/to stop/to halt/(dialect) to sleep/a moment/a short while
to rest for a bit/to take a breather
to take a vacation/to go on holiday
